ðŸ“– Summary: Riot.js is a lightweight and elegant JavaScript UI library that enables developers to build custom, reusable components using HTML-like syntax. It focuses on simplicity, performance, and close adherence to web standards, making it easy to integrate into existing projects or use as a standalone framework.
